description:
My apartment is located on the ground floor of a two family building on a very special street in Carroll Gardens, a neighborhood filled with restaurants, bars and boutiques. 

The apartment consists of a bedroom with queen-size bed, an open living room with dining area and fully equipped kitchen, laundry room, bathroom and small patio. The daybed in the living room converts into a single or king-size bed.

Just 3 blocks from the subway you will have quick and easy access to all of New York City.

Dennet Place is a very special street. Several articles have been written about it. Internet search Dennet Place Carroll Gardens New York to read them.

The F train is located 3 short blocks away. There is also plenty of parking in the neighborhood and several Citibike stations nearby should you want to explore the area by bicycle.
name: Peaceful Spacious 1 Bdrm Apt in Carroll Gardens
review: Wonderful place to stay in Brooklyn  the host was the best would recommend this to all
